t: Mitutoyo being made in USA more and more??? | The Hobby-Machinist
s: I noticed that on Amazon the edge finder from Mitutoyo is made in USA... then looking at other Mit tools, found more of them listed as Made in USA... While Starrett has moved some of the items to China, I am curious why Mit moved from Japan to the USA??? Has the quality dropped? I looked at the pics of them and the edge finder does not look as well ground as I would expect. ... I am reluctant to buy Mitutoyo and many other specialty brands ...
